Changelog
=========
0.3 (2013-03-12)
---------------------
- Getting the filename into the zip archive instead of the id wich would make the extensions disapear when images or files have a custom title.

0.2 (2013-01-16)
---------------------
- First full release;
- Showing the related items widget;

0.1dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial release;
- Zopeskel and boilerplate
